title: Logo font
content:
Hi,

Does anyone know what font this is, or a typeface that closely resembles this (if it's custom lettering)??

Thanks.

| --- | --- |
| [Coppertone.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419184801/http:/typophile.com/files/Coppertone.jpg) | 62.04 KB |
author: Double Elephant

comments.content: Try [Chalet Comprime Hong Kong 1970](http://web.archive.org/web/20150419184801/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chaletcomprime/viewfonts) by House Ind. …
